mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_PRD , PRD_NM , CD_CTG_PET , PET_ITEMS , PRICE_COST , COUNT_STOCK , CD_STATE_PRD , FLG_DELETE , TO_CHAR(DT_REG, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DT_REG , TO_CHAR(DT_UPT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DT_UPT FROM TB_PRD WHERE SEQ_PRD = #{seq_prd}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PRD SET FLG_DELETE = 'Y' , DT_UPT = SYSDATE , UPDATER = #{updater} WHERE SEQ_PRD = #{seq_prd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRD (SEQ_PRD, PRD_NM, CD_CTG_PET, PET_ITEMS, PRICE_COST, COUNT_STOCK, FLG_DELETE, CD_STATE_PRD, DT_REG, REGISTER) VALUES (#{seq_prd}, #{prd_nm}, #{cd_ctg_pet}, #{pet_items}, #{price_cost}, #{count_stock}, 'N', #{cd_state_prd}, SYSDATE, #{register})
